text: Vehbi Akdağ (1 January 1949 - 23 June 2020) was a Turkish wrestler. He was an Olympic silver medalist in Freestyle wrestling. Akdağ competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich where he won a silver medal in featherweight class in Freestyle wrestling"1972 Summer Olympics - München, Germany - Wrestling" databaseOlympics.com (Retrieved on 9 January 2009) He was born in Tokat, Turkey. Akdağ died on 23 June 2020 in Tokat, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Turkey Category:Turkish wrestlers
title: Vehbi Akdağ
